page.title: 10ENTERTAINMENT,CONT.
page.content:
In our area,there isn't much entertainment,as it is a rather quiet area to live in.Television is as popular as ever,and is watched frequently in most households,although annual fetes,fairs,football competitions,etc.
IN BRIGHTON ___________ In Brighton,there is plenty of enterrainment,such as the Dolphinarium ,the Dome(a theatre),a marina and the two piers,the Palace Pier and the West Pier.There is also two cinemas,the ABC and the Odeon.Perhaps the best place to go for entertainment is the Brighton Centre,a large hall,with seats all around;many pop stars have played there.There are also several amusement arcades scattered around the seafront area. By Ian Codling.
